DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Tissue Processor Device Component Manufacturer And Model Name Other Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The manufacturer and style or design of a tissue processor that has not been previously listed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen Tissue Processor Device Component Manufacturer And Model Name
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._An anatomical structure consisting of similarly specialized cells and intercellular matrix, aggregated according to genetically determined spatial relationships, performing a specific function._A device designed for preparing or treating a material; also the part of a computer that makes most of the calculations._A person, enterprise, or entity that produces finished goods._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A style or design of an item._The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 7/19/17 jk transferred context and added registration status, CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 4/28/15 released. jc  4/7/15 VD versioned per COG WG: inc to 100 char, remove min limit, chg concept domain to assessment result. jc 1/25/13 added ACRIN Old caBIG CSI.  3/21/12 - changed origin from IVI to ACRIN.  3/5/08 - released for UoWASH FES CRF.   7/23/07-created for ACRIN PET CDEs
